H0.text: Be smaller than Earth is the characteristic that a model of the Moon should have to be different from a model of Earth.

H1.text: Having a source of light inside is what a model of the Moon should have to differ from a model of Earth.

H2.text: Having a smoother surface than Earth is what a model of the Moon should have, distinguishing it from a model of Earth.

H3.text: Have fewer impact craters on the surface is what a model of the Moon should have compared to a model of Earth.

A4.text: The Moon's mass is 1‚ÅÑ81 of Earth's, being the second densest among the planetary moons.
